sentences.en: " Okay, Mr. Bellamy,'sato said. " Don't blow it. You know the stakes. "
sentences.cn: “ 好了, 贝拉米先生, ” 佐藤说. “ 别搞砸了. 你知道利害关系. ”

sentences.en: "I have reason to think this person is missing," a friend seeking Kimiko Sato wrote on the site.
sentences.cn: “我有理由认为这个人失踪了”，一个寻找佐藤林睿君的朋友在网上写道。

sentences.en: At Spa, 2005, that was the first time Sato crashed Schumacher.
sentences.cn: 2005年的比利时大奖赛, 佐藤琢磨首次将舒马赫撞出赛道.

sentences.en: During a date with Ms. Sato one evening, his boss phoned Mr. Shaw on the pretext of asking him to stop by the office to test some teleconferencing gear.
sentences.cn: 一天晚上，当肖尔先生和佐藤女士约会的时候，他的老板如两人事先约好的计划打来电话，要求肖尔先生到办公室测试一下某种电话会议系统。

sentences.en: No, no, no. My name is Sato, not Shatou.
sentences.cn: 不, 不, 不. 我叫佐藤, 不叫杀头.

sentences.en: Please ask for Miss Reiko Sato in the Semiconductors Dpartment.
sentences.cn: 请找半导体部的佐藤礼子小姐.

sentences.en: SATO is a pioneer in the Automatic Identification and Data Collection ( AIDC ) industry.
sentences.cn: SATO是自动识别和数据采集 ( AIDC ) 行业的先锋.

sentences.en: Sato motioned for Bellamy to keep pressing.
sentences.cn: 佐藤示意贝拉米继续按按钮.

sentences.en: Sato privately expressed " deep gratitude " to Nixon for this " magnanimous " decision to return Okinawa.
sentences.cn: 佐藤对尼克松归还冲绳的 “ 宽宏大量的 ” 决定曾私下表示 “ 深为感激 ”.

sentences.en: Sato pursed her lips, apparently registering Katherine's point.
sentences.cn: 佐藤噘起嘴, 显然注意到了凯瑟琳的观点.

sentences.en: Sato: If the circuits are too wide, we would lose light - sensing surface area.
sentences.cn: 佐藤: 如果电路太宽, 我们就会损失感光面积.

sentences.en: Sato: Pixels are often compared with buckets.
sentences.cn: 佐藤: 图像传感器上的象素经常被比喻成桶.

sentences.en: That leaves Super Aguri, with just number - one driver Takuma Sato so far confirmed for 2007.
sentences.cn: 剩下的超级亚久里车队, 到目前为止只确定了一号车手佐藤琢磨将会在2007年比赛.

sentences.en: The patients had SatO _ 2 0.94～0.97 while inspiring air postoperatively.
The works of Donald Keene, Earl Miner, Makoto Ueda, and Hiroaki Sato are invaluable.
sentences.cn: 唐纳德·基恩, 厄尔迈·因纳, 上田·诚, 和佐藤等人的作品,都是很有价值的.
